name: Prolly Will Die
description:
Small game project made entirely in Scratch 2.0 thats heavily inspired by a game called "You Probably Won't Survive" made by BadGameDev on YouTube.

All assets apart from the sound effects (which are from Scratch's library) were made by me.

You have 20-30 seconds before zombies spawn. You can cut down trees with your axe (Press 1 to equip your axe), shoot zombies with your pistol(Press 2 to equip your pistol) and build walls out of wood (Press 3 to equip wood, if you have any).

Kill as many zombies as you can, because your kill count will be displayed when you die.
